about.title: About FBR Signs
about.subtitle: Your trusted partner in professional signage solutions
about.description: With over 20 years of experience in the signage industry, FBR Signs has established itself as a premier provider of custom signage solutions. We combine traditional craftsmanship with cutting-edge technology to deliver exceptional results.
about.mission: Our mission is to help businesses communicate their brand message effectively through innovative, high-quality signage that stands the test of time.

story.title: Our Story
story.content1: Founded in 2009 with a vision to transform visual communication, FBR Signs has grown from a small local business to a leading signage company serving clients across multiple states.
story.content2: Our journey has been marked by continuous innovation, unwavering commitment to quality, and a passion for helping businesses stand out in today's competitive marketplace.
story.content3: We combine traditional craftsmanship with cutting-edge technology to deliver exceptional results that exceed our clients' expectations every time.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for perfection in every project, from design concept to final installation.

customerFocus.title: Customer Focus

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We embrace new technologies and creative solutions to stay ahead of the curve.

teamwork.title: Teamwork
teamwork.description: Our collaborative approach ensures every project benefits from our collective expertise.

cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to maintain security, enable site functionality, and improve our site. We also use cookies and similar technologies for marketing purposes and to provide personalized content and advertising. You can reject all non-strictly necessary cookies by clicking the corresponding button. You may also choose to customize your cookie settings. By pressing “Accept All Cookies” or continuing to use this site you agree to ourPrivacy Policy (except to the extent you have opted out of certain cookies) and our Terms of Use

returnRefundPolicy.title: Return & Refund Policy
returnRefundPolicy.intro: At FBRSIGNS.com, customer satisfaction is very important to us. This Return & Refund Policy explains the conditions under which returns, exchanges, and refunds are accepted.

sections.title: 1. Customized & Personalized Products
sections.content: Due to the nature of customized and made-to-order products: All customized or personalized products are non-refundable and non-returnable. This includes products made according to customer specifications such as size, color, design, text, or materials. Exceptions: A refund or replacement may be offered if: The product arrives damaged, The product has a manufacturing defect, or The delivered product does not match the approved order specifications. Claims must be submitted within 7 days of delivery, with photos or videos clearly showing the issue.

sections.title: 2. Non-Customized (Standard) Products
sections.content: Non-customized products may be eligible for return if: The item is unused and in original condition. The return request is made within 14 days of delivery. Once approved, the product must be returned in original packaging.

sections.title: 3. Consumer Rights – Brazil & European Union
sections.content: If you are located in Brazil or the European Union, you may be entitled to mandatory consumer rights under local law. Brazil (CDC – Right of Withdrawal): Customers may cancel a purchase within 7 days of receipt, except for customized or personalized products. European Union (Consumer Rights Directive): Customers may withdraw from a distance purchase within 14 days, except for custom-made or personalized goods. These legal rights are not affected by this Policy.

sections.title: 4. Return Process
sections.content: To request a return or refund: Contact us at support@fbrsigns.com. Provide your order number and reason for the request. Attach photos or videos if the product is defective or damaged. Returns sent without prior authorization may not be accepted.

sections.title: 5. Return Shipping Costs
sections.content: Customers are responsible for return shipping costs unless the product is defective or incorrect. Shipping fees are non-refundable. We recommend using a trackable shipping method.

sections.title: 6. Refunds
sections.content: Once the returned product is received and inspected: Approved refunds will be issued to the original payment method. Refunds are processed within 5–10 business days, depending on the payment provider. Bank or card processing times may vary.

sections.title: 7. Exchanges
sections.content: We may offer exchanges for defective or damaged items, subject to availability. Customized products may be remade or replaced, but not refunded, unless legally required.

sections.title: 8. Non-Returnable Items
sections.content: The following items are non-returnable: Customized or personalized products. Items damaged due to misuse or improper installation. Items returned without original packaging.

sections.title: 9. Order Cancellations
sections.content: Orders may be canceled only before production begins. Once production has started, cancellations are not possible for customized items.

sections.title: 10. International Orders
sections.content: International customers are responsible for: Customs duties and import taxes. Return shipping costs for international returns. FBRSIGNS.com is not responsible for delays caused by customs clearance.

sections.title: 11. Contact Us
sections.content: If you have questions about this Return & Refund Policy, please contact us: Email: support@fbrsigns.com. Website: https://www.fbrsigns.com
